In recent NYC news, a hit-and-run incident involving a yellow cab resulted in a man's death, while immigration arrests surged; additionally, a boat crash injured three, and former mayor Rudy Giuliani was hospitalized after a crash, highlighting ongoing safety and political concerns in the city.

### Emergencies & Risks

Tragic incidents in New York City highlight ongoing safety concerns and emergency response challenges.

- A man was killed by a hit-and-run yellow cab driver in NYC, a year after escaping custody. [Read](https://news.google.?oc=5)
